name: boilerplate
description: A boilerplate for creating websites with nunjucks based templates.

scriptsComments.handlebars: render templates with partials (filename starts with underscore) to dist folder
scriptsComments.watch:templates: when a handlebars file change run handlebars to re-render
scriptsComments.serve: start a local dev server and reload browser on filechange in dist folder

author: Milan Bargiel
